sentences: Billy Falcon (born July 13, 1956) is an American musician, composer and music producer.
Pretty Blue World, released in 1991, produced Falcon's highest-charting single, "Power Windows", which broke into the Top 40.
He signed a deal with Mercury Records after Jon Bon Jovi contacted him about working together in the early 1990s.
Falcon has lived in Nashville for the past 19 years.
Over the past four years, he has performed with the band The Sowing Circle and continues to write, perform, record and produce albums for artists, including his daughter.
